alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 8:41PM CDT until May 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Pembina and Cavalier Counties. .Flooding along the Pembina River will continue. All rises are due to snow melt in Canada entering the Pembina River. No major precipitation events are expected for the next seven days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Walhalla. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Friday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
